text: The ominous rivers and mysterious tree's are no rare sight for the exploring Sea-Maiden of the Graeling.
The Graeling are known for their ruthless raids and pillages, usually launched from their impressive fleet of longships.
graill's skill to traverse difficult jungle terrain has proven her a valueable asset for many of explorer, be it Norscan or Dwarven.
A keen sight is both helpful when exploring as it is when taking aim.
Inked with the poisonous blood of slain skinks, graill's arrows are as colourful as they are deadly.
Few know they're way around a mast and oar as graill, Sea-Maiden of the Graeling.
There are not many who have Harald Whyrlas's ear, yet graill is considered champion among Graeling.
The Sea-Maiden harnesses her skill and can bring down any monster, no matter the terrain.
As she blows the Graeling horn hunters gather for their feast: The Hunt.
graill Sea-Maiden is a sight to behold, the Graeling Champion is known for sailing distant corners hoping to challenge worthy beasts and foes.
